original_title: How to Get Out of the Cage (A year with John Cage)
overview: 2012 documentary on John Cage celebrating his 100th birthday in the form of a re-edit of partially unused film material shot for the film 'Time is Musicâ€™ in 1987. Includes interviews and recordings of performances with the influential zen composer.
title: How to Get Out of the Cage (A year with John Cage)
